basics.name: Tien Bui
basics.label: Aspiring Data Analyst and Software Developer | IT Graduate Seeking Entry-Level Opportunities
basics.summary:
Hi, I am Tien Bui,

As a recent Master of Information Technology graduate from Flinders University, I’m eager to kickstart my career in IT. While my coding and teamwork experience comes from university projects, I’m committed to continuous learning.

I’m actively developing data analysis skills in Power BI, SQL, Python, and Excel, alongside programming skills in Swift and SwiftUI. My portfolio showcases my tech dedication. As a collaborative team player, I have worked in teams of various sizes. I am committed to enhancing my skills and experience while contributing to the success of any organisation I work with.

Excited about software development and data analytics, I seek an entry-level role to gain practical experience. Explore my portfolio at https://tienbui1508.github.io to see my passion for tech. If you’re in search of a motivated IT professional like me, please get in touch.

work.name: N/A
work.summary:
•	Designed a bespoke Excel-based roster planner for a client, enabling efficient management of personnel schedules.
•	Utilised advanced Excel functionalities, including VLOOKUP, data validation, macros, and VBA, to automate scheduling processes and enhance usability.
•	Collaborated closely with the client to tailor the solution to their specific needs, delivering a customised tool that streamlines scheduling tasks and improves productivity.

work.name: Upwork freelance
work.summary:
- Provided virtual assistant services, including data entry, internet research, and email management for multiple clients
- Conducted translation, proofreading, and editing of various materials (English-Vietnamese), including business documents, blogs, codes and personal correspondence
- Assisted clients with website and social media management, including content creation and scheduling
- Coordinated with clients to ensure project specifications were met on time and within budget

work.name: ActionAid
work.summary:
- Assisted in building and maintaining strong relationships with supporters through various communication channels
- Prepared and monitored communications to supporters for local rights programs (LRPs), including drafting content and coordinating translations
- Managed child sponsorship database system for assigned LRPs, ensuring timely and accurate data entry
- Supervised a team of 10 volunteers in various tasks, including event planning and outreach
- Conducted translation and other tasks as assigned to support program activities

work.name: BDO in Vietnam
work.summary:
- Assisted management and senior auditors in daily work, including paperwork, inputting data, checking documents, and shipping documents Conducted translation of documents from English to Vietnamese
- Participated in financial audits of client accounts to verify accuracy and compliance with regulations and standards
- Assisted with the preparation of audit reports
- Assisted the Appraisal and Construction departments with various tasks and provided administrative support as needed

projects.name: 454 illustrator - E-commerce website
projects.summary: The 454 illustrator website project is an ongoing endeavor aimed at creating an e-commerce platform for showcasing and selling illustrations. It involves implementing various features to enhance user experience and streamline transactions.

projects.name: Customer churn analysis  [Data Analysis]
projects.summary: Utilised Power Query, DAX, and visualisation tools within Power BI to analyse a fictional telecom company's dataset, examining customer churn patterns and facilitating data-driven insights for retention strategies.

projects.name: Resell Track - iOS app
projects.summary: An iOS app written by SwiftUI that works on iPhones, iPads and Macs. It helps users organise purchased items, track their value, and record sales.

projects.name: Inventory Management System [Cloud Computing Project]
projects.summary: Use Node-RED and other cloud services and tools to develop a cloud-hosted application to assist with Inventory Management.

projects.name: Online Voting System [DevOps Project]
projects.summary: Develop an Online Voting System and apply DevOps principles and tools for the project's development processes.

projects.name: Scuba Diving Calculation Assistant App [Software Development Project]
projects.summary: A Java application designed to automate some simple and complex calculations that are common in the dive industry. The GUI was created from a text-based prototype using Apache NetBeans. Junit was used for unit testing.

projects.name: Twitter data collection and analysis [Data Engineering Project]
projects.summary: Use the power of Twitter API to collect, analyse and visualise one week of data related to Elon Musk to gain insights into the social media behavior of Twitter users.

projects.name: Database system for a Car Rental Firm [Data Modelling Project]
projects.summary: Create a database for a "real-life" case-study - a car rental company. Includes written conceptual model, written and code for logical and physical models.

projects.name: Kitchenware Content Management System [Web based Systems Development Project]
projects.summary: Without using any web frameworks, develop a XAMPP enabled website with a backend database for an e-commerce business, providing mechanisms for a web administrator to add, edit and remove content from their website.

education.institution: Thai Nguyen High School for the Gifted

awards.title: Chancellor’s Letter of Commendation for excellent academic performance
awards.summary:
I am honoured to have received the Chancellor's Letter of Commendation once again in 2023 for my outstanding performance in the Master of Information Technology program at Flinders University. This commendation, bestowed upon me by the College of Science and Engineering, recognises my dedication, academic achievements, and commitment to excellence.

Having received this prestigious commendation previously, it is a testament to the continued effort and commitment I have put into my studies. This recognition reflects my consistent pursuit of academic excellence and my passion for staying at the forefront of technological advancements.

I am truly grateful for the support and guidance provided by the university faculty, whose expertise has been invaluable throughout my academic journey. Their mentorship and encouragement have played a significant role in shaping my skills and knowledge in the field of Information Technology.

This commendation reaffirms my commitment to lifelong learning and continuous personal and professional growth. It serves as a reminder of the high standards I strive to maintain in all aspects of my work, and it motivates me to continue pushing the boundaries of my capabilities.
I am proud to showcase this achievement as it highlights my ability to excel in challenging coursework and projects. It represents the culmination of my educational endeavours at Flinders University and the acquisition of valuable skills and knowledge that will benefit me in my future career.

As I move forward, I am excited to apply my expertise and passion for technology to contribute to the advancement of the IT industry. This recognition fuels my determination to make a meaningful impact, drive innovation, and deliver solutions that address real-world challenges.

I am deeply grateful for this honour and look forward to embracing new opportunities, collaborating with industry professionals, and achieving further milestones in my professional journey.

awards.title: University Medal for outstanding academic performance
awards.summary: I am honoured to have been awarded the prestigious University Medal for outstanding academic performance. This achievement reflects my dedication, commitment, and passion for learning. Maintaining a high GPA and achieving High Distinction grades in all my coursework and projects showcased my excellence in challenging assignments and attention to detail. This recognition symbolizes the culmination of my educational journey and the knowledge I acquired along the way. I am grateful for the support of my professors, mentors, and peers. I am excited to apply my skills and knowledge to drive innovation, advance technology, and deliver impactful solutions. This honour motivates me to continue pushing boundaries, embracing challenges, and making a positive impact in the IT industry.

awards.title: Chancellor’s Letter of Commendation for excellent academic performance
awards.summary:
I am honored to have received the Chancellor's Letter of Commendation in 2022 for my outstanding performance in the Master of Information Technology program at Flinders University. This commendation serves as a testament to my dedication, hard work, and commitment to academic excellence. I am grateful for the recognition I received from the College of Science and Engineering and the opportunity to have this achievement recorded on my Academic Transcript.

The Chancellor's Letter of Commendation is a reflection of my continuous pursuit of knowledge, my ability to excel in challenging assignments, and my attention to detail in delivering high-quality work. It demonstrates my passion for learning and my commitment to achieving the highest standards in my academic pursuits.

I am thankful for the support and guidance I have received from the university faculty and staff, as well as the encouragement of my peers. This commendation motivates me to continue striving for excellence in my future endeavors.

I am proud to showcase this achievement as it represents the culmination of my efforts during my time at Flinders University. It is a testament to my academic capabilities and serves as a reminder of the knowledge and skills I acquired throughout my Master's program.

I am excited to leverage this recognition as I embark on the next phase of my career in the IT industry, where I will continue to contribute my expertise, dedication, and passion to create innovative solutions and drive positive change.
